reviews.comments: Hermosa estadía! Muy recomendable!! Seguro volvemos!
BUENISIMO EL DEPARTAMENTO! La ubicación tambien excelente y pase un hermoso fin de semana!!
La ubicacion del departamento es excelente! Cerca de todo. El dpto de Eugenia es tal como en las fotos, gracias por la estadia!
Ubicación fantástica, el departamento es tal cual se describe, muy cómodo y tranquilo. Eugenia muy amable, nos aconsejó con buena onda siempre que se lo pedimos. Volveríamos sin dudas!

Hermoso departamento, impecable y cómodo.
Excelente servicio.
Eugenia se pasó con nosotros, súper atenta y amable.
Muy lindo el.depto. excelente la ubicacion y muy buena la atencion de eugenia. Lo recomiendo
Excelente depto, ubicación todo muy bien!
Muy buena la atención de Eugenia. Muy atenta en todo. El dpto es muy cómodo. 100% recomendable!
Todo muy bien con el depto! Tal cual se publica, recomendado absolutamente, muy bien localizado, todo a mano! Gracias Euge!
Muy limpio!!! Muy lindo lugar

Eugenia es muy atenta y súper amable!  El departamento es excelente y el barrio también!!  ame este lugar ! seguramente regrese. 
Me gusto todavía más cuando lo vi en vivo! No sabía que tenia todos los electrodomésticos ni que tenia net para ver series!  Súper recomendable! un placer  los hospedajes así. un 10!!

Nuestra experiencia con Eugenia fue excelente, el lugar es exactamente igual como lo describe y ella estuvo pendiente de nosotros todo el tiempo, nos sentimos en casa, estuvimos con nuestro bebe y ella adecuó para que el estuviera cómodo , 100% recomendable. Gracias Eugue por hacer de nuestros últimos días en Baires una experiencia para guardar en el corazón!

Eugenia y Nelson fueron muy atentos y amables, siempre bien predispuestos. El departamento es muyy lindo, mi pareja y yo nos sentimos muy cómodos, y su ubicación es perfecta.
Gracias por todo!
Excelente Opcion

El departamento está perfectamente bien ubicado. En una zona súper céntrica de Palermo. Con restaurantes, supermercados, lugares para salir, tiendas, etc, alrededor. 

La comunicación con Eugenia fue excelente desde el primer momento y siempre estuvo a disposición. Es una persona muy amable.

El departamento es tal cual aparece en las fotografías. Todo en orden y limpio, y tiene una vista bonita desde la terraza. Está bien ubicado y es muy fácil llegar caminando a varios lugares. En la misma cuadra hay muchos bares y restaurantes. Otro punto favorable es que está a un par de cuadras de una parada del bus turístico por lo que es una buena opción en caso tomes ese tour. Sería ideal si el check out podría ser un poco más tarde ya que 10am me pareció muy temprano. En caso de que tu viaje de regreso sea por la tarde o noche, Eugenia  tiene un depósito donde puedes dejar tus maletas con total seguridad. 
Lo recomiendo.
Hermoso departamento, el lugar es mejor que las fotos, excelente atención, y la ubicación increíble, puedes caminar a todas parte y muy cercano al subte
El departamento está muy lindo, buena ubicación, además las recomendaciones de Eugenia estaban bien buenas!

Muy buen departamento. 
Lindo, especial para una pareja. 
Queda en un barrio excelente, con todo lo necesario cerca.  
Para quienes gustan de caminar es ideal ya que tienes parques, tiendas, restaurantes, bares y supermercado cerca. 
La comunicación con Eugenia fue fabulosa, estuvo atenta ante cualquier duda.
Sin duda volveremos a hospedarnos ahí.

El departamento es cómodo y muy agradable. Cuenta con todos los aspectos básicos para hacerlo un excelente hogar temporal. La ubicación es ideal, ya que pudimos movernos fácilmente tanto a pie como a subtes cercanos y hay muchos restaurantes, bares y plazas cerca. Eugenia ha sido muy cordial en todo momento y nos ha ayudado en todo lo que le hemos solicitado. Muy recomendado!

El departamento de Eugue, es muy bueno, la zona es espectacular, lleno de bares y restaurantes como para comer y tomarse algo. Muy bien ubicado y cerca de todo. Además si necesitas algo abajo hay un supermercado con todo lo que necesites. Eugue es una muy buena anfitriona, atenta y con muy buena disposición aparte de muy simpática. Sin duda alguna volvería a escoger su departamento.
Muy buena atención. El lugar es muy bueno, el apartamento muy lindo.
Excelente ubicación. El apartamento es muy cómodo.

Inmejorable ! Limpio, lindo, cómodo .
Que más decir ???
Está en un punto excepcional donde todo es cerca , restoranes , almacenes, supermercados , shopping , aeroparaue !
Eugenia gran anfitriona , me recibió con todo pronto y es muy amable .
Gracias por la experiencia !!!
Del 1 al 10, ..... 15 !!!!
Quedarme en lo de Eugenia fue una súper experiencia. Me atendió re-bien y su departamento está ubicado cerca a todo! Me encantó quedarme con Eugenia, me quedaría con ella muchas veces más!!

Totalmente recomendable! El apartamento era muy acogedor y estaba muy limpio. El pequeño balconcito es un plus, ideal para desayunar al sol. 
Además Eugenia es una muy buena anfitriona, muy amable y rápida al responder a todos nuestros mensajes.

Todo perfecto! el departamento muy lindo, acogedor e iluminado, el barrio muy entretenido y Eugenia siempre muy preocupada en todo momento. Siempre tuvimos una rápida respuesta de su parte y muy buena disposición. Muchas gracias por todo :) Totalmente recomendado
Eugenia fue una persona muy amable y respondió a todas las preguntas que teníamos sobre Buenos Aires. El apartamento es muy lindo con una ubicación perfecta para visitar la capital.

El departamento está muy bien ubicado en el Barrio de Palermo, en un edifício seguro y con vecinos amigables. El interior es muy bonito y acogedor! muy hogareño y con una linda terraza, 
La anfitriona fue muy simpática y atenta, llegué de madrugada a BsAs y sin embargo Eugenia estaba esperandome con las llaves, fue muy  cortés! 
Un Airbnb muy recomendable!

Alquilé el apartamento para mi sobrino que estaba participando la maratón de Buenos Aires y quedó muy contento. El apartamento era bello, en muy buenas condiciones, cómodo y bien ubicado. Eugenia fue muy atenta y contestó rápidamente a unos pedidos de última hora.

I rented the apartment for my nephew who was participating in the Buenos Aires' Marathon and he was very happy. The apartment was beautiful, in very good condition, comfortable and well located. Eugenia was very attentive and quickly responded to a last-minute request.

El apartamento es muy acogedor, tal y como aparece en las fotos. Bien ubicado en un barrio tranquilo y muy cerca del SUBTE. Hemos estado muy agusto y la hospitalidad de Eugenia y disponibilidad a ayudarnos ha sido total. Muy contentos con la eleccion que hicimos. Se lo recomiendo a toda persona que quiera conocer Buenos Aires.
Todo genial! Super recomendable!

Me encantó el departamento.
Eugenia nos recebió mucho bien y nuestra estadia en Buenos Aires fue perfecta. La localizacion del departamento es excelente y todo lo que necesitas está muy cerca. El departamento es silencioso y el prédio es muy bueno. Cuando volvera a Buenos Aires voy a contactarla seguramente. Recomiendo.
Muchas gracias por todo.

Eugenia fue muy amable desde los mensajes y mails desde el principio, nos recibió y nos mostró el departamento el cual estaba súper para nosotros porque era muy acogedor, siempre Eugenia muy a atenta y nos dio una guía de como movilizarnos y cosas que nos interesaban conocer ya que el barrio tiene  muchas opciones por conocer.
el departamento es tal cual las fotos vimos publicadas muy bien cuidado y justo es lo que necesitábamos un departamento bien ubicado, con una vista súper, bien iluminado, moderno y cómodo.
La ubicación es buenísima ya que teníamos muchas opciones para comer, tomarnos un trago, ir de compras, etc.
Muchas gracias a Eugenia y Nelson por ser tan buenas personas y comento algo que nos paso una noche: teníamos un juego de llaves la cual se nos quedo adentro del departamento y luego de contactarnos con ellos fuero al departamento a abrirnos la puerta sin necesidad de llamar a un cerrajero ni nada de eso así de atentos y preocupados fueron con nosotros y lo valoramos.
Así que comparto con todos que es una súper opción para hospedarse si viajan a Buenos Aires, totalmente recomendado.

La descripción era correcta. El departamento es muy lindo y cómodo, tiene calefaccion o aire por si hace frio o calor. También todo lo necesario para cocinar. Muy bien ubicado, a 4 cuadras del metro y hay un bus que te deja a metros de la puerta. Eugenia es muy simpatica y preocupada, mantiene el departamento muy limpio y ordenado. Nos dio todas las facilidades para llegar y nos dio los datos necesarios para que nuestra visita fuese la mejor. Sin duda si vuelvo a Buenos Aires volveria a quedarme aca.

Muy bonito departamento,  muy bien ubicado y Eugenia lo tiene muy bien cuidado, tienes todo lo q necesitas en el.  Fue una semana muy grata y entretenida, muchos lugares cercanos para comer o cenar, el parque está muy cerca y estas a pasos del tren y subte.  Eugenia nos ayudó bastante y es super amable. En conclusión muy recomendable.  Saludos

Eugenia's is amazing! She let us come in way earlier than her check-in time. The apartment is perfect! Very clean with everything you need. Palermo is one of the coolest areas in BA! Perfect place, perfect apartment and perfect price! Recommended!
Is a good place to stay if you want a great location on Palermo. It have a great view of the city and is near bars and shopping. Also you have the subway just a few blocks away.
Tudo Perfeito!

This spot is a perfect space to stay in Palermo. Excellent location. Close to many restaurants and bars. Eugenia was accessible by direct messaging and responded quickly. No issues with wifi. Thank you, Eugenia!

Eugenia was very professional and even though we arrived late she was able to accommodate us. Her place was clean and was in a great location in Palermo. Her building is well secured and we always felt comfortable. I would recommend her place to anyone.
Lovely apartment! Good location, great view, Eugenia responds quickly, good value for money.

The apartment is exactly as per pictures and description. It is conveniently located near everything you may need from subway lines (subte), supermarkets, amazing restaurants ... an outlet mall for shopping :) Eugenia was so accommodating with our check in/out process despite the ridiculous times due to our flight changes. Perfect apartment for an independent couple.

Eugenia's place was in an awesome/walkable/safe neighborhood close to amazing cafes, bars and restaurants.  The apartment was the perfect size for two of us and had a nice balcony to read and relax.  Eugenia gave us great recommendations of places to see in the neighborhood and where to eat in the city.  We would definitely stay there again when we return to Buenos Aires.
Mycket trevligt bemötande, fantastiskt läge
Wonderful place and a great host. Perfect location!

We loved staying at Eugenia’s cute Palermo Hollywood apartment.  

Nice to have a little kitchen with  to store fruit and milk for our regular breakfast. 

Just a short walk to the train that takes you to all the great spots in BA. 

AND Eugenia’s a very kind and helpful host. Much appreciated!!

This space is in a wonderful location, with easy access to bus lines, the SUBTE, and within walking distance to many top sites. Even in such a vibrant neighborhood, the room was quiet at night. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Buenos Aires.

Ótima localização, cheio de restaurantes, mercadinhos, próximo da estação de metrô, ruas tranquilas e seguras para andar à noite. O studio é igualzinho como aparece nas fotos, bem bonitinho e decorado, estava tudo limpo e em ordem. A anfitriã respondeu todas as nossas mensagens rapidamente, tanto antes quanto durante a viagem, e foi super prestativa em fornecer adaptadores de tomadas. Recomendo muito! :)

Uma única observação é com relação ao tamanho do box do chuveiro, achei bem pequeninho mesmo pra mim que sou pequena e magra... então é bom levar isso em consideração na hora de escolher.

De resto, tudo perfeito e melhor que o esperado!

Good apartment in a great area. Close to a lot of bars, restaurants, shops, etc. 
The only drawback was that shower wasn't very powerful. All in all it's a great place to explore the city from!

Great place to stay in Palermo. Steps to restaurants and bars. Place was exactly as described. Eugenia is amazing, great communicator, quick to respond to questions and always provides recommendations.

This is a great little apartment right in the heart of Palermo Hollywood. The location cant be beat. There are tons of restaurants bars etc with walking distance. Communication was great and we really appreciated the flexibility with our check out time.

Eugenia's place in Palermo was lovely and made my trip to Buenos Aires very enjoyable! The place is just as it is described, clean, and perfectly suited for one or two people. There is a convenience store right next door, and a ton of restaurants and bars to choose from in the area. I would absolutely recommend staying here!

Eugenia foi muito atenciosa e nos deu todas as informações que necessitamos, sempre respondendo prontamente nossas dúvidas.
A localização do apartamento é excelente, dá para fazer tudo a pé pelas redondezas. Próxima de transporte público, restaurantes, bares, mercados e tudo que podemos precisar. Inclusive, bem ao lado do prédio tem um mercadinho. Pra quem gosta de vida noturna, é o melhor lugar para ficar também, pois tem muitas opções.
O apartamento é como nas fotos: limpo e organizado com toalhas e roupas de cama cheirosos é bastante espaço para acomodar nossos pertences. Só o box do banheiro que achei pequeno. O prédio é super tranquilo, limpo e silencioso. 
Adoramos nos hospedar no apartamento e recomendamos.

The apartment is in a perfect location. Close to breakfast, lunch, dinner, nightlife, breweries, and transit. We absolutely would stay here again. Eugenia is a wonderful host! Met us the day of our checkin and gave a great suggestions, answered all our questions and was in constant contact to ensure we were all set on arrival and for departure. Would definitely stay here again.

Eugenia's apartment looked exactly like the photographs and we were not disappointed.  It is in the perfect location with loads of bars and restaurants in the neighbourhood.  It is also centrally situated so that you can explore the city by foot, Subte, taxi or  bus.  We would definitely recommend her lovely little apartment in Palermo.

Eugenia was waiting for us outside the building with her beautiful daughter and no better welcome to BA could have been offered. She was super sweet and offered her assistance for tips and recommendations for our stay. We will come back to Buenos Aires and we will let Eugenia know so she can accommodate us again.  Thank you so much!
Beautiful and clean! It was located in the best area of Palermo Hollywood and we will definitely have to stay here again!!!

Juste ce que l'on souhaite pour un séjour de découverte et de ballades dans la ville. L'appartement est situé dans un immeuble neuf et de bon standing. Le lit est parfait pour un sommeil réparateur. Le quartier de Palermo est à la fois calme et central et on y trouve à 5 ou 10 minutes à pied d'excellents produits et de bons restaurants comme ... Las Cabras ! Notre hôte est venue nous accueillir personnellement malgré son état de ... future maman très proche semble-t-il.

Juste ce que l'on souhaite pour un séjour de découverte et de ballades dans la ville. L'appartement est situé dans un immeuble neuf et de bon standing. Le lit est parfait pour un sommeil réparateur.
Le quartier de Palermo est à la fois calme et central et on y trouve à 5 ou 10 minutes à pied d'excellents produits et de bons restaurants comme ... Las Cabras !
Notre hôte est venue nous accueillir personnellement malgré son état de ... future maman très proche semble-t-il.

The apartment was exactly as advertised  and check in was super easy with Eugenia meeting me and showing me the apartment. 

The neighbourhood is fantastic with amazing restaurants near by and easy access to the subway by walking. 

Eugenia was a fantastic host and went above what is expected to help me out with everything i needed. 

Highly recommend!

This is the perfect place for a solo traveler or a couple. The apartment is very clean and many restaurants, shops and bars are less than 5 minute walk from the apartment. Eugenia responds very fast to any questions you may have. I highly recommend this place to anyone!

This is a great place in a fabulous part of Buenos Aires.  So many great restaurants within a short radius.  If you are fussy about coffee there are quite a few really great coffee bars nearby that leave Starbucks and Havana in the dust. I recommend Cafe Registrado for breakfast and coffee.  The apartment is exactly as pictured—very tastefully decorated.  Small but space is used very efficiently with a limited, but adequately equipped kitchen. The apartment is at the back of the building and very quiet. Eugenia was very responsive and helpful.  I arrived late on the ferry from Uruguay and she arranged for someone else in the building to give me the keys. If I had one complaint, it's that the Internet is slow.  This is not a problem that the owner can do something about, but a chronic problem in Buenos Aires.  Internet speed varies by building and neighborhood.  It's okay unless you have a lot of work to do that involves uploading or downloading large files to the Internet. For email, it's fine.

The place was about what I expected - but I had expectations. Eugenia is really friendly and has a nice apartment that is a perfect base to explore the neighborhood. There is a lot of nearby food options - and she provides a nice suggestion list to narrow down the options. Highly recommended.
Fantastic place and a great host!Made our stay in BA so easy. Thanks so much Eugenia!

O Studio de Eugênia é compacto, mas muito agradavel e moderno. Sua localização é excelente, tanto para compras diurnas como para vida noturna. Cama confortável, silencioso para dormir.Gostei muito e recomendo.
We had a pretty good stay at Eugenia's apartment. The apartment is located at vibrant Palermo. A good play to stay!

Die Wohnung ist genauso wie in den Bildern gezeigt, mit elementare Haushaltsgeräte ausgestattet (Küche) und allgemein großartige Sauberkeit! Ich finde die Wohnung optimal für einen junge/mittelalterlichen einzelnen Reisende,  da die Lokation bietet viel Nightlife an mit Restaurants und Kneipen in der nähe. Die Umgebung ist trotzdem ruhig genug falls man doch sich ausruhen möchtet.  
Gerne wieder!

The apartment looks exactly as shown in the pics, equipped with basic kitchen appliances and in general a great cleanliness! I find the place perfect for a young single traveler as the location offers plenty of Nightlife with its restaurants, bars, and pubs around. However, you will be able to get some rest as the noise do not reach the room during sleeping hours.
I would definitely book it again!

The space is exactly as detailed and is a great deal for the price. It is in a lively location in Palermo. Within walking distance to numerous restaurants and bars. Eugenia always responded questions quickly and was just a great host. I highly recommend it and wish I had more time to spend there!

I never met Eugenia but she was always quick to respond. Her neighbor was there to greet me and check-in was very smooth. The apartment is slightly smaller than it appeared in the photos but otherwise very accurate description. Location is great and there is plenty to do on foot and also easy access to transportation. The small balcony is nice for having morning coffee and enjoying the sun. Kitchen could have been a little cleaner and was equipped sparsely. Nevertheless I would stay there again.
Die Wohnung in einem angenehmen Teil einer sehr schönen Straße, hat eine sehr gute Atmosphäre und die Infrastruktur ist sehr praktisch. Ich möchte gerne wieder kommen!
Nice Place! Palermo is great! We had a great time!

Perfect apartment, very clean and quiet. Although it's in the middle of Palermo! Many restaurants and bars just around the corner, we loved to stay there. Getting to City"Centre" takes you about 20 Min. by tube- and a 10 Min. walk to go to the tube.
Eugenia was very friendly and even arranged a private storage of our luggage. Thanks a lot!
Clean, bright and comfortable in a great location with a great host
Great appt. Lovely restaurants and bar in the neighboorhood

A Eugênia foi uma ótima anfitriã, super acessível e comprensível em relação ao horário de check-in fora do padrão.A descrição e as fotos condizem com o apartamento, sem contar que a localização é realmente excelente! Recomendo ;)
Lovely place. Eugenia and her friend were very helpful and flexible with my check-in and check-out needs. Highly recommended place in a great location.
Very convenient pricexand location
Lovely flat in Palermo, well located. Had great time, loved the balcolny with the view !
Had such a lovely stay- the flat has everything u need and is wonderfully comfortable. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend!
This flat is in a great location, super spacious and clean. I loved staying here. The host was awesome with lots of knowledge of the local area and a really nice person.

Awesome location. Nice size studio for 2 people. Very walkable and close to great restaurants, bars and shopping. Eugenia is very nice, easy to reach and super responsive to messages. Definitely stay here.

This was my boyfriend and I's second stay at one of Eugenia's apartments and everything went as smoothly as the first time. Eugenia is a wonderful host: very responsive, accommodating, and nice. The apartment was perfect too. Spacious for two people and full of natural light. The balcony is a huge plus! I highly recommend this place and would undoubtedly stay there again.

O apartamento é exatamente como descrito. Super bem decorado e limpo. O Wi-Fi funciona bem e da pra acessar o netflix. A estação de metro de Palermo está próxima e a rua onde fica o apartamento é cheia de bons cafés e restaurantes. Mesmo não tendo conhecido a Eugénia, ela sempre foi muito receptiva para responder mensagens e combinar entrega das chaves. Recomendo fortemente e quero voltar!
Eugenia's place was clean and modern. Super center location in Palermo Hollywood with many bars and restaurants.
Everything was perfect. The unit was clean and we'll equipt. No issues. The location is also great. Lots of restaurants    in the area.
Eugenia foi ótima e o apartamento é uma graça!
The flat was comfortable and in a great location. Eugenia was helpful and responsive to any questions I had.
Great flat. Great location and Eugenia was very helpful in giving us recommendations and advice.  10/10!
The apartment was lovely, as described, very clean and in a great location. Eugenia was very quick to respond and helpful.

Nice studio in a great area in Buenos Aires. Has everything you need, but can get a bit noisy in the weekend since you are in the middle of BA nightlife. Subway is a 10 minute walk. Shopping, great restaurants, bars, coffeeshops, all within walking distance. Eugenia was fantastic in helping us out when we had questions and very flexible by giving us the opportunity to leave our luggage in storrage until 20.00.
Great little apartment in The heart of Palermo, really enjoyed the stay here. Thanks Eugenia

Eugenia was great. She met us at the flat after i explained we were delayed and was totally cool about it.
The flat is the perfect location to enjoy all the cool restaurants, bars and cafes that line the streets in the palermo Hollywood area of Buenos Aires.
Eugenia provided some good tips of places to check out too. 
The flat was immaculately tidy and clean and perfect for a few days in Buenos Aires.
Recommend to all.
Eugenia was a very nice host and the appartment was very central in Palermo. We had a great stay in Buenos Aires and we would certainly recommend to stay here!
A descrição é adequada, a localização é excelente e a anfitriã muito atenciosa. Só tivemos  problemas com a rede elétrica por duas vezes, o que gerou desconforto.

Eugenia was a wonderful host. The apartment was absolutely perfect and exactly what we needed for our our stay in BA.
All of the restaurants and bars she recommended were very much to our taste and style! 
The area was fantastic, I went running alone and strolled around the streets and felt very at home for the whole stay. What we loved most was the convenience and also the style of the apartment. During the early evening we would sit on the balcony and have a bottle of wine.
Can't wait to come back and will be recommending it to all our friends visiting BA.

Lovely stay in Palermo, the apartment is in a great location and is perfect for what you need. The design is cool and it has an amazing view from the balcony. Eugenia was really helpful and I would definitely recommend staying there!
Eugenia was an amazing host. She was super communicative and kind, and her apartment was perfect for a solo traveler. I always felt safe, and it's in a great neighborhood. Thanks so much!!
One of the best Airbnb experiences ever. Everything went well. Best location and very nice apartment. I can only recommend it.
